info.description: 所有 API(登入API除外), 都需要在 Cookie 中帶入 SettingSession 或 GraphicSession token
info.title: Metadata Service API

post.description: Get the list of available web plugins (excluding "ui")
Get metadata (meta.json) of all available web plugins (excluding "ui")

200.description: Map of plugin name to meta.json content

500.description: Failed to read plugin directory or meta.json

deviceID.description: unique id of a mobile device
